verbose_text: Moreover, islet innervation seemed to be unaffected in MafA RIP mice, as shown by the presence of autonomic nerve fibers (XREF_FIG, and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY) and 2DG induced glucagon secretion in MafA RIP animals (XREF_FIG).
evidence: MafA RIP  mice, as shown by the presence of autonomic nerve fibers ( XREF_FIG , and  XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY ) and 2DG-induced glucagon
